#summary This page contains links and information about all of the current Python Codec downloads for RL-Glue.

*Notes:* To use this or any other codec, you must have RL-Glue Core installed first.

=== Available Downloads ===

 * [http://rl-glue-ext.googlecode.com/files/python-codec-dev-2.0-RC1.tar.gz Python User Distribution 2.0-RC1] [http://code.google.com/p/rl-glue-ext/downloads/detail?name=python-codec-dev-2.0-RC1.tar.gz (File Details)]
 * [http://rl-glue-ext.googlecode.com/files/python-codec-dev-2.0-RC1.tar.gz Python Developer Distribution 2.0-RC1] [http://code.google.com/p/rl-glue-ext/downloads/detail?name=python-codec-dev-2.0-RC1.tar.gz (File Details)]

=== User Quick Install ===
{{{
#Unpack the files
>$ tar -zxf python-codec-dev-2.0-RC1.tar.gz

#Change to unpacked directory
>$ cd /path/to/python-codec-dev-2.0-RC1

#Go into the src directory
>$ cd src

#Install the Codec
>$ python setup.py install

}}}
